verses.name: Acts 24:17
verses.text: Now after many years I came to bring alms to my nation, and offerings.

verses.name: Acts 24:18
verses.text: Whereupon certain Jews from Asia found me purified in the temple, neither with multitude, nor with tumult.

verses.name: Acts 24:19
verses.text: Who ought to have been here before thee, and object, if they had ought against me.

verses.name: Acts 24:20
verses.text: Or else let these same here say, if they have found any evil doing in me, while I stood before the council,

verses.name: Acts 24:21
verses.text: Except it be for this one voice, that I cried standing among them, Touching the resurrection of the dead I am called in question by you this day.
